alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:39PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 515 PM MST... At 438 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Queen Valley, or 7 miles west of Superior. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Superior, Florence Junction, Queen Valley and Boyce Thompson Arboretum. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 212 and 231. AZ Route 79 near mile marker 150. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 164 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
